articles.author: The Quint
articles.title: WATCH G20 Summit Day 1 LIVE: PM Modi Welcomes African Union As Permanent Member - The Quint
articles.description: G20 Summit LIVE Updates: With arrival of world leaders like Joe Biden, Rishi Sunak, Justin Trudeau and others, India is all prepped to host the G20 Summit's Ministers Meeting in New Delhi on 9 and 10 September.
articles.content: "Today, as the president of G 20, India calls upon the world together to transform the global trust deficit into one of trust and reliance. This is the time for all of us to move together. In this ti… [+343 chars]

articles.author: Nandita Bose, Aftab Ahmed
articles.title: G20 leaders open summit, admit African Union as permanent member - Reuters
articles.description: Leaders of the world's 20 most powerful economies began an annual summit on Saturday in New Delhi by granting permanent membership to the African Union in an effort to make the G20 more representative.
articles.content: NEW DELHI, Sept 9 (Reuters) - Leaders of the world's 20 most powerful economies began an annual summit on Saturday in New Delhi by granting permanent membership to the African Union in an effort to m… [+4899 chars]
